title: Conference
description:
Step by step scenario:


1. Login to the ssp-root web interface;


2. In the menu "IVR applications" add a new IVR Application. Select the type ”Conference” of IVR application



3. Add advanced parameters for your IVR application. Some details about options you can find in our official documentation:

 https://trac.sippysoft.com/trac/wiki/public/IVR/CallingCard


4. In the DID Pool menu please add a new DID number and assign to IVR Application made in step 2.

5. In the Accounts menu click “Login as account” to make a new conference.


6. Open the page “Schedule a Conference” and add new conference via accounts web interface. Enter the subject of conference, select a “Date”, “Start time” and “End time” for new conference. If you want to invite someone by e-mail, type E-mails in the field “Invite E-Mails”. After adding information about conference press the button “Schedule”


7. After the above actions you will get an access code to joining a conference.


8. Send the DID number and access code to all future participants of the conference.

If you want to invite someone by e-mail, type E-mails in the field “Invite E-Mails”. After adding information about conference press the button “Schedule”         7. After the above actions you will get an access code to joining a conference.       8. Send the DID number and access code to all future participants of the conference.
